titleStmt.title: To the supreme authority, the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England The humble address and congratulation of many thousands of watermen belonging to the River of Thames.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Streater, and John Macock, Printers to the Parliament,

notesStmt.note: Recites the history of the Parliament from the point of view of its supporters, and professes loyalty.
Order to print dated: Tuesday, January 31. 1659. [i.e. 1660]. Signed: Thomas St Nicholas, Clerk of the Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
